intro:
An adorable adventure full of mischief, laughter, and bubbles!
Join the Trabus family and meet magical creatures, enjoying their humor and friendship.
description:
A magical and mischievous story where four furry friends accidentally save the world!

The Trabus just wanted to play their annual prank, but... something's happening in Lunaria.
The magical animals are disappearing!
Now the Trabus must rescue them, make new friends, and, of course, get into mischief.

An interactive graphic audio novel ideal for children, full of humor, color, and music.

Highlights:

·Fully narrated interactive visual novel.

·Full-color illustrations in a charming 3D animated style.

·Four adorable protagonists: Pinkbu, Greenbu, Yellowbu, and Bluebu, mischievous little furry friends with unique personalities.

·Unforgettable magical characters like Mopi, Triki, Ronronius, Spindleboo, and many more.

·A fun, tender, and mischievous story, structured by chapters.

·Cheerful and charming music accompanies each scene, just like in an animated film.

·Music gallery with an original song for each Trabu and, of course, for Mopi.

·Perfect for encouraging reading, imagination, and empathy through laughter.

·Designed for girls and boys who enjoy magical worlds and endearing characters.
